content: I’m always amazed by the talents and unique perspectives artists bring to their work. @premamenggala @Jayant_arts_04 @cliffreeve https://t.co/4vqNXlqzyY

It was a pleasure presenting my friend, Clint Eastwood, with the inaugural Clint Eastwood Award for Cultural Leadership at the @MontereyJazzFestival.  We had a wonderful time listening to the incredible music of @KyleEastwood and @MavisStaples! #DarinAtwater @LoriMcCreary https://t.co/SOi3oo8LFq
A new season of Lioness returns on Oct 27 @ParamountPlus https://t.co/6SyujnZSDZ

On this #InternationalDayofFriendship I want to acknowledge my long-time business partner and friend @LoriMcCreary at Revelations. We met in 1992 and founded #RevelationsEntertainment five years later. She’s an incredibly gifted woman and… a dear friend. https://t.co/esby7G25KI

#HelpAmericaVote National Poll Worker Recruitment Day is Thursday, Aug. 1st! Poll workers are needed across the country and it’s a great way to strengthen our democracy.  Any registered voter can apply, and most get paid. @beapollworker Register now at https://t.co/C2EkCZa3NX https://t.co/YKvhmkX7cO

Congratulations to my fellow @KennedyCenter Honor recipients 2024: @FrancisFordCoppola, the @GratefulDead, @BonnieRaittOfficial, @Arturo_Sandoval_Arocha and the @ApolloTheater. Your outstanding artistic achievements have been a great gift to American culture. https://t.co/qXwKvXCuPM

Thank you all for the wonderful birthday wishes! Today I'm reminded of the vastness of the universe and the endless journey of the spirit. @timrobbinshere https://t.co/HQs4jWgGLf

This week was supposed to be the final episode of Hello, John Doe. But everything changed when our host Todd Matthews passed away just as we were wrapping up production. Todd's family and Steve Patterson were left to pick up the pieces. And we are all heartbroken. #HelloJohnDoe https://t.co/0J0Barrdit
